channel.title: Joachim Wehner on David Dreyer Lassen

item.title: It Isn't Just about Greece: Domestic Politics, Transparency and Fiscal Gimmickry in Europe
item.description: Presented at: Boston College, the University of Copenhagen, the Hertie School of Governance, Princeton, Stanford, EPSA, and the IMF/Swedish Ministry of Finance.
